public interface ConfigurationInterface

All objects which are to be configured via the configuration mechanism need to implement this interface. This method is called at system startup and when a new configuration is made available to the application. The passed in parameter is the root of the ArgArray tree in the configuration XML associated with this object.

Method Summary
 void configure(ArgArray configuration)
          Provides a method to configure object properties.
 

Method Detail

configure

void configure(ArgArray configuration)
               throws java.lang.Exception
Provides a method to configure object properties. The registry argument contains an ArgArray composed named values. Any values that are not specified are assumed to be left unchanged. That is, if a value is not present, do not assume it means 0 or true or some other default. This allows the configure method to be used to set a single value without affecting other values.

Parameters:
configuration - contains incoming configuration parameters as named values.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
